name: ROKART
description:
It is a game that was supposed to be created 30 years ago for Atari, a computer version of the popular electric car racing game. The control is only about adding and subtracting gas with the right Ctrl key (or left for the other player).

I am asking for payments in any amount to my account. Contributor min. PLN 20 can get access to additional functions, such as: a second player, switching views, choosing the number of laps, detailed instructions, version for Android, possibly with additional tracks.
